channel.title: Invisionapp on Landing Pages Collection | Lapa.Ninja
channel.description: Recent content in Invisionapp on Landing Pages Collection

description.p: DESIGN DISRUPTORS is a new documentary about the rising importance of design as a competitive advantage in disruptive technologies. Learn about the design process and product designers at the world's most disruptive products, like Google, Twitter, Airbnb, Spotify, and more.
